scenes.background: You're managing both tasks. [Bob] reviews the report with you.
scenes.description: [Bob] says, 'Can you also ensure the formatting is consistent while you work on the report?'

options.text: Sure, I can handle the formatting as well. Just keep me posted on any changes.
options.analysis: You demonstrate good social skills and self-regulation, but your motivation might take a hit due to the added workload.

options.text: Maybe you can take care of the formatting while I focus on the content.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation but might appear less empathetic and less perceptive of the overall task needs.

options.text: Let's split the tasks more evenly. I'll handle the report if you take care of the formatting.
options.analysis: You show good emotional perception and empathy, but your motivation and self-regulation might suffer due to the unexpected task distribution.
